name: Relayer Advanced EXTRA PACK
description:
Also available:

Relayer Advanced - Season Pass

This is a special bundle set which includes the main game, "Relayer Advanced" and 9 DLC mechas.
＊The main game and DLC mechas included in this product can also be purchased separately. Please be careful not to purchase them in duplicate.

■"Relayer Advanced"＆"Stellar Gear NEXT" 9-unit set

【Items available】
・"Relayer Advanced"（The main game）
・Astoria NEXT、Terra's battle data +
・Amaterasu NEXT、Sun's battle data +
・Petasos NEXT、Mercury's battle data +
・Herschel NEXT、Uranus's battle data +
・Galaxy Star NEXT、Milky Way's battle data +
・Comet NEXT、Halley 's battle data +
・Al-Jauza NEXT、Mintaka's battle data +
・Epsilon NEXT、Alnilam's battle data +
・Zeta NEXT、Alnitak's battle data +
